column5: Hey Guys I made it out last Sunday with 2 buddies & we nailed 10 Trout, maybe be able to convince the Wife to get out Sunday, Drop Shotting at it's best Tight Lines Richard   28" Rainbow & 2 Nice Browns
I'd love to have a plate of rainbow filets for tomorrows dinner!!  Nice fish.
Nice stuff Richard... is the ski bike for sale!! lol
Nice work those are some nice fish.
Very nice Richard. Now, remeber how ya did that, and do it again after April 1st

Darcy's brother went to buy one a few weeks ago & ended up bringing 4 home I think he has 9 now lol, he's in Sprucegrove Alberta & even has 0ne with Licence & Insurance lol, just to piss off the Bylaw Officer Tight Lines SBK
Really good day!!  Drop shotting for trout, there's a technique I haven't tried.

Worked relly good last year 10 Browns in 1/2 day, things were slow so I tried it & after 1 Rainbow & Brown told my buddies you better be switching & it worked 10 Trout & Darcy caught about a 5.5 lbs Smallie, seen they were using it on the Niagara & it works, as long as we aren't catching Smallies Tight Lines SBK
Just curious what was the bait you were using on the dropshot?  I'm hopefully going to be out this weekend wouldn't mind trying this.
X Zone Slammers & Bassmagnet Twitch Tight Lines SBK
Glad to see you are getting out and making the most of it Richard!
